00027 #include <libxml/tree.h>
00028 #include "FeatureOption.h"
00029 
00030 class InstallEntry;
00031 
00032 using std::string;
00033 using std::vector;
00034 
00036 class InstructionSequence
00037 {
00038 public:
00039   InstructionSequence();
00040   InstructionSequence(const InstructionSequence& refSequence);
00041   ~InstructionSequence();
00042   void AddInstruction(string instruction);
00043   void SetStartingDirectory(string directory);
00044   string GetStartingDirectory() const;
00045   void SetShell(string shell);
00046   bool Execute(InstallEntry* logEntry, int numProcessors, bool logFilesWritten) const;
00047   bool DumpToFile(FILE* file) const;
00048   bool Save(xmlNodePtr parentNode, string type) const;
00049   bool Load(xmlNodePtr instructionNode);
00050   bool IsEmpty() const;
00051   void ReplaceString(string oldString, string newString, bool includeStartingDir);
00052   void Clear();
00053   InstructionSequence& operator=(const InstructionSequence& src);
00054 private:
00055   bool Translate(InstallEntry* logEntry, int numProcessors) const;
00056   bool HandleIfStatement(InstallEntry* logEntry, FILE* outputFile, bool skipLines, int& lineNumber) const;
00057   bool ConditionFulfilled(const FeatureOptionVector& variables, int lineNumber) const;
00059   vector<string> mInstructions;
00061   string mBaseDirectory;
00063   string mShell;
00064 };
